posts.post_content:
I've decided to sell my 1887 Old Judge cards both cards are HOFers.   I'm not sure what to offer for pricing since these are POP 1's but will take offers.    I also have them listed on eBay as my seller's name is jackiemoonaba33.  

Thanks
Bobby


Billy Hamilton - PSA 1 (POP 1) none higher   **SOLD**

FYI 

SGC has graded 29 Hamiltons and 68 McCarthys

Plenty of comps out there.

[quote name="Schwertfeger1007" post=2327262]FYI 

SGC has graded 29 Hamiltons and 68 McCarthys

Plenty of comps out there.[/QUOTE]

Not sure how you came up with these number.    I went on SGC website, and these were the results.   There's been no sales on these cards since 2013 & 2017 in a PSA holder. 

Hamilton POP 9 and only 1 with the card I have for sale. Hamilton has 6 variations.


McCarthy POP 20 and only 3 W/ St.Louis that I have for sale.   McCarthy has 9 variations.
So what did Hamilton sell for

Why does it matter if it is a PSA sale vs SGC...especially in lower graded / altered cards?

SGC only recently started designating poses so specific pose pop #'s are meaningless. 

Hamilton only has 5 poses (not 6) and none command a premium over any others. 

I was giving you the benefit of the doubt that you were sincerely trying to find comps (vs trying to make these sound more special then they actually are) my mistake :)
